args:
Thanks to the prince's strength and Su Fang's
mana abilities, Valfarre is defeated for good.
Afterward, the Lunar New Year is celebrated
in grand fashion, and the party reflects on the
brilliance of the town as dozens of
pyroblossoms fill the night sky.
Now, Su Fang! Remove the mana\nthat surrounds the beast!
Are we back? What happened to Valfarre?
The beast has fallen. It is over.
I thank you, dragonblood prince,\nfor bringing true peace to this land.
And you as well, children of Peng Lai.\nThis triumph is thanks to all of your efforts.
I am unworthy of such praise, sir.
Just had to show up and steal all m'glory,\nyou old so-and-so!
This is why you seem so cool while I\njust come across as some old fart.

It is certainly not my fault you come off
that way. After all, are you not planning
to dance with your trademark vigor again
at this year's festival?
'Course I am! After all, this one's a double\ncelebration of the new year AND the\ndemise of that foul critter!
Ah, yes. You wouldn't know about that.\nYou see, Peng Lai... Well, he...
It would be faster to simply show you\nrather than attempting to explain it.\nYou'll see it before long, I'm certain.
Come on now, children! To the town!\nIt's festival time, I tell ya! Festival time!
It's like flowers are blooming in the sky.
They seem more beautiful this year\nthan ever. Perhaps this is because\nof all we have been through.
Everything seems a little more beautiful\nwhen seen after protecting something\nheld most dear.
Don't think this is all there is to them,\nnow. Let's try a change of venue!
After all, there is an optimal distance\nand angle that ensures the finest\nviewing experience.
I have actually calculated the precise place\nyou should stand, so please come with me!
Ooh hoo hoo! I know them fireworks\nare fine and all, but make sure not to\nmiss the show goin' on over this way!
Look at Peng Lai go! What a dance!
This here dragon dance is m'pride and joy!\nBack'n forth! Back'n forth! Hoo hooooo!
Yeah! Cut some rug, ya old geezer!
Peng Lai, you old coot! You're so cool!
Ah ha ha! It's been so long since I\ncelebrated the Lunar New Year!
I'm really glad we came here.\nLook how happy everyone is!
Thank you so much, Su Fang.\nYour pyroblossoms were amazing.
It is I who should be thanking you for\nall you have done for me.
I have been thinking on how my father\nsaid I did not understand the most\nimportant thing about pyroblossoms.
I was obsessed with putting on a showy,\ncolorful performance. But when I saw\nall of you, I knew I had been mistaken.
Us? But we don't know anything\nabout your art.
All of you are strong, yet you never make\nostentatious shows of strength. Instead,\nyou fight for the sake of the people.

Seeing that helped me to understand
what my father meant. Pyroblossoms
should be performed for the sake of
the people, not the technician.
That is why I have been able to\nimprove my art this day.
Well, I'm glad we could help.
I thought myself to be a fine pyroblossom\ntechnician, and yet it seems your\nfather managed to surpass me.
From my perspective, pyroblossoms were\nmerely a method for teaching the people\nof this town how to handle mana.
I never considered how much they might\nactually enjoy them. In a way, I suppose\nyou could even say I deceived them.
Do not say such things! Were it not for\nyour foresight, this town would have\nfallen to Valfarre.
He's right. Without you, there wouldn't\neven be a town left standing.
So, in a way, you WERE making your\npyroblossoms for the sake of the people.\nIs that right?
Regardless of the reason for your work,\npeople HAVE enjoyed it.
In fact, pyroblossoms were one of the\nthings that gave me hope after the\npassing of my parents.
Everyone is looking forward to your\nskills, Xu Fu, so please give them the\nshow they desire!

Very well. This year, I shall fire off
pyroblossoms not in an attempt to train
others to keep evil at bay, but purely
for the enjoyment of the spectacle!
Those are Xu Fu's pyroblossoms!\nOoooo! Aaaaaah!
Welcome back, Xu Fu!\nWe've been waiting for you!
The people of this town have always\nwelcomed me thus.
Before, I did not have any particularly\ndeep feelings about it, but at some point,\nthat changed.
I now see their warm reception\nas something joyous.
We of the Qilin tribe possess a singular\npower, and thus choose to remove\nourselves from worldly matters.
And yet, for some reason, I always\nfind myself wanting to return here.
I think it is because this place is my home\nand there are people here waiting for me.
And so, the Lunar New Year celebration continued.

And each and every person—no matter if
they called Peng Lai home or only returned
once a year—spent the evening reflecting
on their good fortune.
